SourceXMLToCidocConvertion

public SourceXMLToCidocConvertion(java.lang.String mappingFilePath,
                                  java.lang.String FilePath,
                                  java.lang.String destinationFolderPath)
                           throws javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException,
                                  javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                  org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                  java.io.IOException
Takes as input the mapping file in xml format and a Source xml file and produce a rdf file.

Parameters:
mappingFilePath - the path of mapping file.
FilePath - the path of the Source xml file.
destinationFolderPath - the path where will create the Result.rdf file.
Throws:
javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException
javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
org.xml.sax.SAXException
java.io.IOException
